response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by its users. Given its exceptional quality and features, we believe it's worth more than what many people pay for similar items. Considering its true value, I propose a price of $120 for you to acquire this product. This offer takes into account both the cost of production and the perceived value to ensure a fair transaction. I trust you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
